summary: The class centralizes console output and logging, offering methods to emit messages at multiple verbosity levels, handle debug and warning streams, display banners (including cowsay style), prompt users, report errors and deprecations, and manage input/output file descriptors and an optional message queue.
business_intent: Provide a single, configurable interface for all userâ€‘facing and diagnostic output in an application, allowing developers to control message visibility, format, and routing based on runtime settings such as verbosity, debug mode, and custom queues.
